description:
Celebrating International Museum Day, Lisbon's maat presents Nyege Nyege: A New Hope. 
The broadcast, curated by Pedro Gomes, takes in DJ sets & performances from six different parts of the world â€” South Africa, Mali, Tanzania, Saint Lucia in the Caribbean Sea, Reunion Island and Uganda. The forward thinking communities and ideas in these places unite under one flag; one of progression, confrontation, celebration and understanding.
